mutants.code:
import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    string = string.lower()
    string = re.sub('[^a-z0-9]', '', string)
    return string != string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    string = string.lower()
    string = re.sub('', '', string)
    return string == string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    string = string.lower()
    string = re.sub('[^a-z0-9]', 'MUTATED', string)
    return string == string[::-1]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    string = string.lower()
    string = re.sub('[^a-z0-9]', '', string)
    return string == string[::+1]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    string = string.lower()
    string = re.sub('[^a-z0-9]', '', string)
    return string == string[::-2]

def is_palindrome(string):

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    string = string.lower()

    return string == string[::-0]

import re

def is_palindrome(string):
    string = string.lower()
    string = re.sub('[^a-z0-9]', '', string)
    return string == string[::--1]
